00002  * Dan Sutherland <dan@chromerhino.demon.co.uk> and Gary Harris <gharris@zip.com.au>.

00014 #include "About.h"
00015 #include "ADFlib.h"
00016 #include "zlib.h"

00018 /* local prototypes */
00019 LRESULT CALLBACK AboutChildDlgProc(HWND, UINT, WPARAM, LPARAM);
00020 LRESULT CALLBACK AboutChildDlgProc(HWND, UINT, WPARAM, LPARAM);
00021 void InitAboutBox(HWND);
00022 void AboutOnSelChanged(HWND);
00023 void KillAboutBox(HWND);

00025 /* external globals */
00026 extern HINSTANCE instance;
00027 
00028 LRESULT CALLBACK AboutDlgProc(HWND dlg, UINT msg, WPARAM wp, LPARAM lp)
00038 {
00039     LPNMHDR nmhdr;
00040     aboutInfo *ai;
00041 
00042     switch(msg) {
00043         case WM_INITDIALOG:
00044             ai = malloc(sizeof(aboutInfo));
00045             SetWindowLong(dlg, GWL_USERDATA, (long)ai);
00046             ai->tabControl = GetDlgItem(dlg, IDC_ABOUTTABCTRL);     
00047             InitAboutBox(dlg);
00048             return TRUE;
00049         case WM_COMMAND:
00050             switch(wp) {
00051                 case IDCANCEL:
00052                     EndDialog(dlg, TRUE);
00053                     return TRUE;
00054             }
00055             break;
00056         case WM_CLOSE:
00057             KillAboutBox(dlg);
00058             EndDialog(dlg, TRUE);
00059             return TRUE;
00060         case WM_NOTIFY:
00061             nmhdr = (NMHDR *)lp;
00062             switch(nmhdr->code) {
00063                 case TCN_SELCHANGE:
00064                     AboutOnSelChanged(dlg);
00065             return TRUE;
00066         }
00067     }
00068     return FALSE;
00069 }
00070 
00071 LRESULT CALLBACK AboutChildDlgProc(HWND dlg, UINT msg, WPARAM wp, LPARAM lp)
00081 {
00082     switch (msg) {
00083     case WM_COMMAND:
00084         switch (wp) {
00085         case IDC_WEBPAGEBTN:
00086             ShellExecute(dlg, "open", "http://adfopus.sourceforge.net/",
00087                 NULL, NULL, 0);
00088             break;
00089         case IDC_EMAILBTN:
00090             ShellExecute(dlg, "open", "mailto:gharris@zip.com.au",
00091                 NULL, NULL, 0);
00092             break;
00093         case IDC_ADFLIBBTN:
00094             ShellExecute(dlg, "open", "http://perso.club-internet.fr/lclevy/adflib/",
00095                 NULL, NULL, 0);
00096             break;
00097         case IDC_ZLIBBTN:
00098             ShellExecute(dlg, "open", "http://www.cdrom.com/pub/infozip/zlib/",
00099                 NULL, NULL, 0);
00100             break;
00101         }
00102     }
00103     return FALSE;
00104 }
00105 
00106 void InitAboutBox(HWND dlg)
00112 {
00113     TC_ITEM tie;
00114     RECT rec;
00115     int i;
00116     aboutInfo *ai = (aboutInfo *)GetWindowLong(dlg, GWL_USERDATA);
00117     char tempStr[1024];
00118 
00119     tie.mask = TCIF_TEXT | TCIF_IMAGE;
00120     tie.iImage = -1;
00121     tie.pszText = "About";
00122     TabCtrl_InsertItem(ai->tabControl, 0, &tie);
00123     tie.pszText = "ADFlib";
00124     TabCtrl_InsertItem(ai->tabControl, 1, &tie);
00125     tie.pszText = "xDMS";
00126     TabCtrl_InsertItem(ai->tabControl, 2, &tie);
00127     tie.pszText = "ZLib";
00128     TabCtrl_InsertItem(ai->tabControl, 3, &tie);
00129     tie.pszText = "Credits";
00130     TabCtrl_InsertItem(ai->tabControl, 4, &tie);
00131     tie.pszText = "Greets";
00132     TabCtrl_InsertItem(ai->tabControl, 5, &tie);
00133 
00134     ai->pages[0] = CreateDialog(instance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDD_ABOUTPAGE1), ai->tabControl, AboutChildDlgProc);
00135     ai->pages[1] = CreateDialog(instance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDD_ABOUTPAGE4), ai->tabControl, AboutChildDlgProc);
00136     ai->pages[2] = CreateDialog(instance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDD_ABOUTPAGE6), ai->tabControl, AboutChildDlgProc);
00137     ai->pages[3] = CreateDialog(instance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDD_ABOUTPAGE5), ai->tabControl, AboutChildDlgProc);
00138     ai->pages[4] = CreateDialog(instance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDD_ABOUTPAGE2), ai->tabControl, AboutChildDlgProc);
00139     ai->pages[5] = CreateDialog(instance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDD_ABOUTPAGE3), ai->tabControl, AboutChildDlgProc);
00140 
00141     // Get Opus version number and write to page 1 of About box.
00142     LoadString(instance, IDS_VERSION, tempStr, sizeof(tempStr));
00143     SetDlgItemText(ai->pages[0], IDC_OPUS_VERSION, tempStr);
00144     
00145     // ADFLib, ZLib version and date.
00146     sprintf(tempStr, "This copy of ADF Opus is using ADFlib version %s.", adfGetVersionNumber());
00147     SetDlgItemText(ai->pages[1], IDC_ADFLIBVER, tempStr);
00148     sprintf(tempStr, "%s", adfGetVersionDate());
00149     SetDlgItemText(ai->pages[1], IDC_ADFLIBDATE, tempStr);
00150     sprintf(tempStr, "ADF Opus uses ZLib %s for its GZip compression support.", zlibVersion());
00151     SetDlgItemText(ai->pages[3], IDC_ZLIBVER, tempStr);
00152 
00153     GetClientRect(ai->tabControl, &rec);
00154     TabCtrl_AdjustRect(ai->tabControl, FALSE, &rec);
00155 
00156     for (i = 0 ; i < 6 ; i++) {
00157         MoveWindow(ai->pages[i], rec.left, rec.top, rec.right - rec.left, rec.bottom - rec.top, FALSE);
00158     }
00159 
00160     ai->curPage = 0;
00161     ShowWindow(ai->pages[ai->curPage], SW_SHOW);
00162 }
00163 
00164 void AboutOnSelChanged(HWND dlg)
00170 { 
00171     aboutInfo *ai = (aboutInfo *)GetWindowLong(dlg, GWL_USERDATA);
00172 
00173     ShowWindow(ai->pages[ai->curPage], SW_HIDE);
00174     ai->curPage = TabCtrl_GetCurSel(ai->tabControl);
00175     ShowWindow(ai->pages[ai->curPage], SW_SHOW);
00176 }
00177 
00178 void KillAboutBox(HWND dlg)
00184 {
00185     int i;
00186 
00187     aboutInfo *ai = (aboutInfo *)GetWindowLong(dlg, GWL_USERDATA);
00188 
00189     for (i = 0 ; i < 4 ; i++)
00190         DestroyWindow(ai->pages[i]);
00191 }
